name: Random Hues
description:
Explore millions of color hues/shades/tones in your Figma and FigJam design files for perfect color palettes that suit your design next project.


Features:

  • By using the random button, you always get a pleasant color palette that generates in real time.
  • There are millions of possible combinations to genrate your next color palette.
  • Every shade of color has a name.


Open source:

  • Color-scheme.js for harmonic color generation.
  • Ntc for giving name of the color.
  • Code is open-source you can support and contribute here https://github.com/realvjy/random-hue


Feedback:

I'd love to know what you made using random hues. Feel free to tag me or say hi on Twitter (@realvjy). You are also welcome to share your feedback or bug reports üôè


UIHUES: My other project, uihues, has handcrafted color palettes. instagram.com/uihues


Support:

The goal of this project is to contribute to the open design community. Even though I do not intend to charge for these community resources, if random hues (uihues) has ever been useful to you or your team, I would appreciate your support! It helps to maintain server costs and keep it grow. buymeacoffee here
